title: Knife of the Undermountain King
content:
type unlocks:

Snatched from the realm of the mad wizard Halaster Blackcloak, this knife became a prized keepsake of a duergar king.

Shortsword Light Finesse

Knife of the Undermountain King is one of the Shortsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Knife of the Undermountain King is a powerful magical sword that makes results of 19 into critical hits and gives you a reroll on low damage rolls, it also helps against obscured targets by giving you advantage to the attack roll.
